title: New: Solar Year â€“ Seeing The Same
content:
Solar Year hold a special place in my heart, as being the first act that I saw at SXSW.

Just as the festival was beginning to kick into gear on Tuesday afternoon, walking into a dimly lit converted garage to be greeted by the immersive, enigmatic sounds of the Canadian duo was a rather memorable manner in which to start an unforgettable week. Of their glitchy, sagacious set, one track in particular caught my attention; the remarkably peerless Seeing The Same. Handsome vocal sections echo with a heavenly resonance, building to each swirling, pinacle. Quite truly a masterpiece of a track.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
